summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that verify the functionality of Qiskit’s multi‑controlled multi‑target (MCMT) gate implementations, covering supported gate types, control behavior, ancilla chain configurations, simulation fidelity, and error handling for missing qubits.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of MCMT gate components in the Qiskit library so that developers can rely on accurate quantum circuit construction and simulation.
